snippet.title: 'Issues' that destroyed Johnny Depp and Vanessa before Amber Heard 'seduction'
snippet.description: From the moment he locked eyes on Vanessa Paradis in the lobby of the Hotel Costes, Paris, in 199,  was hooked.  “She was wearing a dress with an exposed back and I saw that back and that neck, and then she turned around and I saw those eyes, and - boom! My life as a single man was done,” Johnny, 57, once told the Daily Mail.   that point, Vanessa had already been in love with him for years, having fen for his charms when they met at his Los Angeles nightclub, the Viper Room, in 1993.  “The thing is, I loved him before I was with him, but we had met,” she previously told The Times.   "I remember perfectly the first time. He just shook my hand and I thought, ‘OK, that’s it’... He didn’t only look good, everything was good. He was so sweet, so different. He just seemed like a good person. I just knew... there was no one better.  The couple went on to have children Lily-Rose, 21, and Jack, 1, and enjoyed a quiet life living in a quiet village in the South of France.  They never married - ...
